title: eppOdu un aruLai
sahitya:
eppOdu un aruLai indA enrenakku appanE taruvAi Arumukhap-perumAnE


anupallavi

  ippOdE adanai IndiDalAgAdO IndiDak-kOri nAn EndiDum kaigaLil


caraNam    tappAdun tirunAmam dinamum dhyAnikkum ippEdai paDum pADu eppOdu tIrumO
appA tuNai tAvena azhaittuk-kadarinAl appOdu tAn unadu aruLaip-peruvEnO
